website_summaries.verdict: Delivers both sealing and cleaning properties for stone counters.
pros: Creates a protective layer to keep the porous surface of the counter top guarded, while leaving a polished surface
Cleans many different kinds of soils and stains that you'll find in the kitchen
Works well for substances like quartz, marble, granite, quartzite, and soapstone
cons: A higher than average cost for granite cleaner

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on composite granite sink
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my composite granite sink and it worked like a charm, I didn’t realize how bad my sink was before until I took a picture 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Shellbell

customer_reviews.title: The positive reviews have to be FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: We were so hopeful for this product. We tried it on multiple types of stone surfaces and granites in our home. It did no more than if we had rubbed water into the surface. The rave reviews have to be falsified. The unopened bottle we received is a completely fake product. It had no sealing or shining properties at all and we applied exactly as the manufacturer suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: I just used this, and it seems to have done the job. My pre-sealed granite counters are 9 years old and I hadn't resealed. I cleaned the counters and stone backsplash thoroughly, let them dry. Then, instead of spraying, I poured some of the sealant out on the counter. I applied it with one clean microfiber cloth, timed 2 minutes, then buffed with a new cloth. I waited 2 hours and repeated on both the counters and backsplash. I think that it did the trick. I know now how they should feel, so I'll see how long the sheen and protection last. They really look new, and they are very smooth and silky to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: We have lived in our current house for 2 years. In that time, we have fought soap scum in the marble shower and have not been able to stay on top of it. I finally took mouse sander and fine sandpaper after it. I then washed the walls and let dry thoroughly. After reading the reviews of this product, I had high expectations. After one application, water runs off the walls where before, you could see it sitting on the scum. I have also applied this to the backsplash behind my stove and kitchen sink with great results. Next weekend, I will bee introducing it to the marble bathroom sinks and vanity. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Paid reviews. Amazon should catch on to this
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. Looks like reviews have been bought. I too purchased because of good reviews. Applied 3 times and nothing. Compared section of granite that was not treated to section that was and no difference. Dissapointed that there is not anything that can be done about this.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions and applied the sealer on our new granite top. What a disappointment! Water still goes through the stone and we actually got a dish soap stain. This did nothing not even polish looks exactly like before. Maybe I got defective product since there are so many good revoews
customer_reviews.author: Cindybeur

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Did the granite counters in kitchen and bathroom at least 3 times each following directions. It doesn’t repel the water as it is supposed to. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: handyandy

customer_reviews.title: Great sealer
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing stuff. Not only did it seal but the soap scum residue that I couldn’t get off disappearrs after I applied this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTMENT!!! The reviews are better!!!
customer_reviews.text: Of course your counters would look clean after you clean it! I was excited to read the positive reviews and purchase this product however, it was a disappointment!!!! This product did nothing different from the less expensive brands I purchase at the store. I did a side by side test and there’s nothing unique about this one from others. The shine and protection is the same so save yourself the time and money. I’m still trying to figure what all the fuss is all about. Not worth your $20. Go grab yourself 4-5 bottles with that price.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Misleading package description
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed to find that this product has a specific label for cancer and reproductive harm that isn’t included in the pictures...will not buy again and do not recommend. Also feels like the description changed over purchasing as this originally came up under safe and non toxic and it’s just plain poison which I would not have bought had I know.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth spending a penny on
customer_reviews.text: Plain water would have worked better than this. Either something has happened with the production of this or someone is paying for reviews. I ordered three of the products in this line based on the reviews and spent around $45 all of them were like using plain water.
customer_reviews.author: MOA68

customer_reviews.title: Give your dull granite counters a high end look. WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far, and it turned our brand new dull granite counters into a highly polished granite. My husband even noticed! The granite looks like a completely different quality. We moved in about 5 weeks ago to this new house, and the counters had not been sealed. The slightest spot of water would leave a dark mark. NO MORE! If you have granite, get this product. I never did the "get your next bottle free" which it says on the lid, because most people who have tried never got one. I would buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Recommend. Failed to work!
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy the granite cleaner and sealer at home depot but thought I would give this brand a try because it had so many reviews. I tested it twice on part of my counter and it did zero to seal it or add shine to it. The stuff at home depot works amazing and keeps my counter with a high gloss finish. This product actually made my counter look WORSE then before I'd used it! I couldn't believe it so I tested it a second time and same thing. I do not trust this brand. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LOVETHEBEACH21

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if it's a bad batch but I have sealed everything 4 times
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's a bad batch but I have sealed everything 4 times. It can't even keep water out. I don't know what I could do wrong since the instructions are so simple.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unknown if it's working
customer_reviews.text: It's slightly greasy, and when I applied it, it stayed in multiple little puddles. Rather than waste it soaking into a washcloth, I applied it with my hand because it was pudding/not-quite-beads up all over the place, and I couldn't tell if it was serving any kind of a purpose at all. I kept on smearing it around until it evaporated/dried, then buffed it with a microfiber cloth. No difference seen or felt. Wish I could put it to the test if I knew it woudn't risk damaging the granite, but I'm not going there.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless.
customer_reviews.text: This did absolutely nothing for my dull bathroom vanity top. Whoever cleaned the house before I bought it used something that took the original sealant off the stone vanity top. I have dull etched rings where leaking containers of harsh cleaners must have been placed on the stone, small scratches, dull areas of wear, and water spots. This product was a complete waste of money and time. It didn't penetrate even the completely dull, etched and worn areas. Let me repeat that: it does not permeate even worn stone surfaces that no longer has any sealant. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: So glad I decided to try Trivova❤️
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the reflection of the light you’ll be able to see how dull it was in the before pic. I put the bottle in the after pic. I can see a nice glass like shine after just one application. My granite felt slightly gritty before and now it feels nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Cozy Novel Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with wonderful results
customer_reviews.text: Works well with a brilliant shine. I thought I'll just try this until I decided to buy a more expensive sealer. This will work for me as I expect to apply it every 6 months by removing the sprayer and pouring it on the granite. Make sure the granite is well cleaned before applying to get optimum results. I bought a large pack of microfiber cloths/rags for applying and shining.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Just wow. Silky smooth granite !
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sceptic. Even when a product is good, I will nitpick it. This product however really impressed me! I recently bought a house with granite countertops. This is the first time I’ve had granite. My prior home had Corian, which is so smooth. I was surprised and disappointed that the house house granite was was not very smooth. I used this product and problem solved! The transformation is amazing. I love how smooth and silky my countertops feel. I love, love love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: C L D

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - and I have tried SEVERAL! I have a huge granite island and counter tops in a house I recently purchased. I don't think the prior owners ever sealed it! I tried 3 or 4 products that left a hazy, grimy feeling - and was pretty frustrated and not sure where to turn. I found Trinova while I was purchasing a leather protectant product that a friend recommended. I did a bunch of research and read the reviews and decided to try Trinova - I LOVE IT!!!!! my counters are now like GLASS! it's fantastic! Really!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Boy this stuff makes my granite shine!
customer_reviews.text: Granite sealers are all the same...or so I thought. I ran out of my ancient sealer, and decided to try this one. It was super easy to apply (unlike my old sealer) and it smelled nice too! It went on really quick (again, unlike my old stuff), but the real surprise was how smooth and shiny it made my granite. It was mirror smooth....so smooth that I thought glasses would actually slide off of my counter! Not sure yet how long each application will last, but it was so easy and quick to do, I won't mind doing it more often.
customer_reviews.author: Mom To Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first applied this product as it just seemed to 'sit' on the surface. However, after applying according to the VERY simple directions, I noticed a distinct difference in the smoothness and shine of my granite countertop. Loved that this product did NOT have an odor and is safe to use in the kitchen area. I don't know how long this will last but even if I had to redo every 3 months that would still be okay with me. Must admit I'm shocked that I did not have to use a smelly, messy product to achieve these results.
customer_reviews.author: DiJeff

customer_reviews.title: no idea if effective or not
customer_reviews.text: Since my granite counter is already glossy, I have no way of telling whether the sealer is providing any protection or sealant. It honestly just looks like it smears around then dries and then I wipe the residue off and, shrug. it looks identical to before I did anything...
customer_reviews.author: Par4dox

customer_reviews.title: Seal your granite often.
customer_reviews.text: My granite installer recommended that my newly installed granite be sealed once a year. I seal my kitchen island granite every 3 months and my outer perimeter counters every 6 months. This product works great and is affordable enough to do it more often that the recommended once a year. My granite was an investment and this product is a simple way to keep it looking great!
customer_reviews.author: OPROOT

customer_reviews.title: Unless one is to place 3 or more coats at one time, this does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions (1 coat) but a day later oil spilled on the granite and left a dark mark. I then placed another coat even heavier than the first, and still subsequently another mark was left on the granite. Unless the granite (3 months old) is defective, this is just an inferior quality project.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty

customer_reviews.title: Best ever. No more searching
customer_reviews.text: "I have used many different products both professional and off-the-rack. Usually professional products worked well but very expensive and required muscle strength to apply. I used the Trinova Sealer and found that it was really easy to apply, the surface was really smooth and water-resistant. In addition, the price is right. I will use this product from now on. No more searching."
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is WONDERFUL. We just had granite installed and the installers sealed the counter before they left. We received this product the following week and decided to seal it again and the difference is night and day. I can’t believe how smooth it made the granite. The towel just slides across the counter almost by itself. Amazing. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Paint Horse Mom

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! I am impressed. It definitely sealed my new marble kitchen countertops. It does not have a scent and it was easy to use. I allowed it to cure overnight. My countertops are shiny as well. I have recommended this product to my friends and some family members as well. It is water-based so I may have to re-seal in another month or two, but I am ok with that. I would say the disadvantage is not being able to pick it up at a retail location, however, the product did ship to me quickly and it was in a sealed bottle (no spillage). I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: VML

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. I was getting water stains under objects left on the granite, so I bought this to seal it. Followed instructions, no change. Repeated five times. Still no change. Still water stains form under anything left on the countertop. I even poured a bunch on the countertop and left it sit there overnight, hoping it would penetrate, then wiped it clean the next morning. Still no change. I might as well have used windex for all the good it did. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Just used for the first time today and I am happy with this purchase. Does the job with ease and that is exactly what I wanted because if it's too much trouble, I won't use it. It has a pleasant, not over-powering scent, spray on, rub in, wipe off 2 minutes later and let sit for an hour. I don't think it gets much easier than that.
customer_reviews.author: Sjbeem

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: TriNova Granite Sealer & Protector is a great improvement over the previous product I had - it doesn’t require a full day to completely mature, doesn’t require painstaking buffing with a succession of clean cloths, doesn’t have a noxious stink, and IT WORKS! Spray it on, wipe quickly with microfiber cloth as instructed, & when I return a couple of hours later, the surface looks and feels smooth and shiny. I’m delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Read the lowest ratings before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: After initially reading the reviews I thought this was going to work out great, but there’s minimal change to my marble counter tops. Honestly, I only see a glimpse of shine and I repeated the process multiple times. Would I buy it again? No
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I needed a granite sealer. I narrowed my selection down to this sealer based on this product’s reviews. The Trinova Granite Sealer & Protectant did a great job. Our granite before treatment absorbed water. After treatment, the water pools on the surface and does not absorb at all. I don’t have experience with other brands but I can say this one works.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Composition unknown
customer_reviews.text: The product is beyond effective. I bought it after seriously damaging my granite countertop w/ easy off (I know, I’m embarrassed). The product is not intended to fix etching; however, I used it repeatedly for a week and now the etches are unnoticeable!! My only concern, hence the 4 stars, is that the bottle has a warning saying that the product may cause cancer and reproductive harm, and does not disclose the composition. I have been using it with a mask and gloves, window open, just like when I use easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sealer protectant. I did a lot of research before ordering it. I wasn’t sure my granite counter tops needed this treatment, but they seemed slightly dull to me after five years. Once I used this product, the counter tops were so much shinier and removing food and other debree lifts so much easier. I ordered a 2nd bottle because I don’t ever want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! I had not sealed my marble counter tops ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I had not sealed my marble counter tops for over 10 years (getting very dull). I had to put 3 coats on the marble to get great result. This was not the fault of the product but that it had not been sealed for so long. - The 2nd and 3rd coats I let the product dry rather than immediately wiping it off. The shine is great and items glide across the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Jim V.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to some really nice results after using this on our marble countertops in our bathroom which have lost some of their sheen but I didn’t notice any change at all after using this...followed the directions as written and buffed and waited the allotted time for “curing” but didn’t see any noticeable difference in shine or a change in dull spots unfortunately...after reading the raving positive reviews I’m disappointed but perhaps I had high expectations...looks the same! Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Easiest to apply and luster finish
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best granite polisher I have ever used. I have tried every leading brand and my Runner up fav was Weimans. But this by far is number one. It gives you the most smooth and polished finish ever. With such little elbow grease. My granite counters were rough and water stained and tall. After just one application of this, the shine and luster and smoothness is restored. I am absolutely amazed. I highly recommend this product and this will be my go to for granite polishing.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER S. ITO

customer_reviews.title: May be great, but...
customer_reviews.text: This product is super easy to use and didn't stink up the house. My issue: there was no visual difference at all. It may very well be that my granite countertops are sealed up better than before...but there was no difference with regard to degree of shine or touch. Not a lot of polishing action going on. One spot in the counter had been covered up with a cutting board since new, and it looks a lot shinier than the newly sealed/polished surfaces. Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: It did the job easily and coupled with the granite sealer my countertops look ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for product use via email. As stated it concentrated and a little goes a long way. It did the job easily and coupled with the granite sealer my countertops look and feel clean. Water beads and wipes off readily. Additionally I love the smell, its subtle and lacks that typical janitorial smell of other products. I found my go-to granite cleaner! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Manzano

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure if this works that well. The shine is nice but it seems to me you wipe off just as much as you put on. Followed directions and still have a small water stain on a portion of our new bathroom vanity after applying it. Wish companies would make old-fashioned paste again like a carnauba wax!
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected!
customer_reviews.text: Did not perform as we had expected. It did clean our in laid granite table, but the finishing polish so the table looks like raw bear stone. We are having a professional come in and reseal the very expensive table and apply a layer of polish to return it to its original state. If you are looking for a cleaner, this will strip your table but be aware that it may remove the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Brill

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all on marble
customer_reviews.text: Got a new marble table about a month or so ago and sealed it with this protector, since is says it seals marble as well. I had a bottle of wood floor wax on my table for about 5 minutes and some of it got on the already sprayed table and it stained it immediately. This stuff doesn't protect marble!
customer_reviews.author: Korgy

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to apply but it did not work
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to apply but it did not work. My counter top still absorbs water and leaves dark stains.
customer_reviews.author: Karan

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: When I spray this on, it looks water sitting on my granite. I expected something thick but not like water. Not sure how spraying thin water like substance, let tilting it sit then wiping will do. I wipe and shine it and feels ok. My test is if I can slide something across the counter, it’s the ultimate smoothness along with shine. This does not do that. No gliding a glass type of smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Hribal

customer_reviews.title: East to follow directions with great results!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to having granite countertops and was VERY concerned that I take great care of them. I googled what it the best cleaner and sealer for granite counter tops. After reading several different sources, it became apparent that Trinova is the BEST product for my needs. I have just applied it and I'm thrilled that the instructions were easy to follow, and the countertops look AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: sheilae

customer_reviews.title: sealer seems to work pretty well, counter is smooth to the touch
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have water marks on my granite counter top (e.g., cup rings), and the granite sealer seems to help with the feel, but the granite cleaner + sealer didn't do much to get rid of the water marks despite a fair amount of elbow grease. Might need a professional treatment. Should have applied this immediately, though I have no perspective on its long term effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Erik W.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing more than water
customer_reviews.text: I can't figure out what all the positive reviews are for. It does absolutely nothing more than water. Maybe a bad batch but I have done it multiple times in a row and water still doesn't bead up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Moran615

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for granite countertops
customer_reviews.text: When we put in granite countertops I didn’t realize how porous granite is. And how dull it becomes from wiping. The sealer/polisher returned the original sheen and added a layer of protection that made it retain the sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Nyitray

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the granite sealer and protector because I have used it previously. I love the product because it is easy to use and leaves my granite countertops shiny and well protected. When my granite sealer arrived, the plastic sprayer that screws on top of the bottle was cracked and broken in pieces from shipping. I had planned on using the sprayer from my empty bottle of granite sealer, but then the Company contacted me to see how I liked the product. I told them, and mentioned about the broken sprayer on my new purchase. They sent me a replacement bottle with a new sprayer. Very good customer service ! Highly recommend the product and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Welzenbach

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it should!
customer_reviews.text: My first time sealing granite counter tops that were installed a year ago. Followed all the instructions but at first I couldn't see much difference. However, once it sat for a while and cured I was able to see the shine come back. So be patient and let it sit. Very pleased with the results and highly recommend. Easy to use with great results.
customer_reviews.author: B. Watts

customer_reviews.title: No smell and works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!!!! It works amazing! Our granite isn’t very old so I didn’t think I’d notice a difference but I do and it is so shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jl.riggs

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to seal and protect the granite in our home we just built. Seems to work well, we use it with their cleaner before sealing. Comes with a cloth to wipe off after letting the sealant sit. Application was easy after reading the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Allyn

customer_reviews.title: It seals
customer_reviews.text: I read and read about sealers and eventually bought this one. It seals and that's what I care about. An overnight coffee stain came right up. I have hard water and those spots come off. Haven't had an oil spill yet. I sprayed it on, let it sit for a minute, then buffed it around, wiped it off. No streaks (use microfiber).
customer_reviews.author: Cloroxmartini

customer_reviews.title: I don't know much about sealing, but this seems pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the granite counters in my new rental's bathrooms started to get dark rings on them and found out that they needed to be resealed. Used this and no more dark rings! I don't think the water beads up exactly like it should on a totally sealed counter, but honestly I'm not sure. It's very easy to use and took a total of 5 minutes to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I tried one section of my counter to give the product a try. I had done a 3 part system when I first got the granite (clean, seal, shine) Yuck! Such a pain and time consuming! Just finished and wow! My counter is so smooth feeling. And shiny too. It was so easy I thought I was doing it wrong. I will look forward to doing the rest of the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tina C.

customer_reviews.title: Confidence in quality
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I've used the cleaner (and Trivnova Granite Sealer) on my brand new granite kitchen countertops, so I'm not sure I can fully rate it. However I certainly didn't have any issues, and the product was quite easy to use and smelled really good. Loved that it came with a microfiber cloth. Very happy to have the cleaner paired with the sealer product - So far it rocks!
customer_reviews.author: B G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this to seal granite throughout my new house. I can still see wet spots on it when I get it wet, meaning it didn’t seal well. I followed the directions on the bottle. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This spray goes on easily and has a pleasant odor. While at first it seemed very watery and I questioned if it was actually sealing the surface but, in fact, it did. I used the sealer on new counters of granite and marble, sealed twice, and both sealed easily leaving no darkening or stain at all. Great sealer!
customer_reviews.author: Flight Attendant

customer_reviews.title: Sealed it
customer_reviews.text: the product was very easy to use and sealed my granite in the kitchen and bathrooms very well. Additionally, i had a shipping issue and this company reached out to me proactively to check on the shipping. when i shared that there was some issues, but i was still able to use the product, they still wanted to send a new product. GREAT PRODUCT and SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: TeresaC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use granite sealer
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to apply. Left the countertops with a very nice silk feeling and shine. My only complaint is that on areas of the countertop that get the most wear, I had to keep reapplying and still wasn't completely satisfied. The water beads up and it has been easier to clean. I think the stuff the professionals used when they installed the granite provided a harder finish, but this product is a close second. Would recommend and will use this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: kivec

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great finish
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product on Amazon after reading reviews and description of item. We purchased a new house and the granite was water spotting. The sealer was really easy to use, wipe on, dry, leave for an hour. This morning I noticed a nice shine to the granite and the surface feels like glass. Water beads up and wipes away. I am really happy with how this item seals my granite counter top. I would like to read on the label how often to reapply the sealer, also what the ingredients are.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's super easy to use and there is a noticeable difference afterward. Water beads up on the granite just like the day that we moved in. Cons: I imagine the markup is quite high for a product like this and it could be cheaper, but honestly it's worth it to protect the investment of your granite countertops.
customer_reviews.author: J Berg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: This product does not actually seal stone. I used as directed, and unfortunately still had issues with water seeping into my marble table. It is great for use as a daily cleaner but will not protect your stone from even water. I recommend a product like Tuff Duck....this worked very well and has kept and further damage from occurring to my marble table. I still use this product for daily cleaning, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: DentSedDoc

customer_reviews.title: Fraud; bottle of water; positive reviews are fake
customer_reviews.text: Save your money; it’s just a bottle of water. I followed the instruction and it didn’t work on any of the 3 stone surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: AARON MORRIS

customer_reviews.title: Seals refinished counter well
customer_reviews.text: the sealer was put on after using kit to refinish 5 year granite counter. The sealer went down well. I put two coats on. so far so good. Appears to be the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Brad R

customer_reviews.title: Like water
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do anything. Cleaner or sealer. Soap and water worked better than the cleaner, sealer didn't do anything. It applies like scented water and wipes off like scented water.
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: Great sealant
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our new marble coffee table that needed to be sealed. Once we used it there, we very quickly wanted to use it on our granite kitchen counters and vanity. This product makes your rock surfaces so smooth to the touch and is a great sealant against water.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Lenington

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I checked the ratings and comments before purchasing this product. I concur that it is easy to use. My marble top was also smoother after the application, but I did not notice the improved shine one reviewer mentioned. Maybe it is a question of the condition of the stone as well as the color? In any case, I was pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R J Ho

customer_reviews.title: ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: This product did not give me the results I was expecting. I have tried it 3 different times at this point, following the directions exactly. my countertop that is less than 2 years old does not come out shiny in the least bit. it barely looks or feels as though I've done anything to it. Not worth the money or the hassle in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Madi

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy product to give an instant review on
customer_reviews.text: This Granite Sealer and polisher seems to work great and that is why I am giving it 5 stars. It is really impossible to tell how well it will hold up to daily cleaning but I have no reason to to suspect that it won't. It goes on easy with microfiber cloth and I let it set up at least a couple hours to insure that it cured well. It does what I expect a granite sealer to do but as I said in the title, it is not easy to do an instant review because of the endurance possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Daytripperdave

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on the granite in my kitchen and it brought it back to life. I was very impressed. I have tried a bunch of other but never satisfied. This is absolutely the Best! Don't waste your money on others this one WORKS. I also did my bathroom granite sink and kitchen table. Will definitely buy again. I have already told my daughter and friends about how great this is.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Trudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Works well, smells really nice, but I apply it differently
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product and another high ranked "diamond" one. I like the scent of this one better- maybe personal preference. I think the application advice given by the other brand may be better if you have a lower grade granite- like I do. I spray it on liberally and then use a paint edging pad to wipe across my granite in all directions so it gets into the little "pits". Then, I wipe it off with a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Jhar

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with stone sealer. Used for my natural quartzite countertop. I like that the process is quick and easy (little down time), but wasn’t too impressed with the results. After an overnight dry, the counter did feel more slick than before, but there are still some dull areas. I wonder if the quick and easy application process equates to a less effective outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not disappoint...
customer_reviews.text: My granite surfaces were starting to lose their original sparkle. I remembered that I should seal them. When I searched for this product on Amazon, the reviews were overwhelmingly positive. When I tried it out on my own, my experience was the same. The sealant is so easy to apply (spray and wipe away) and my surfaces are shining like they used to. I feel better knowing that my countertops are sealed again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Louw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, with great results!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sealer because I read good reviews about it, and the only other time that I tried to seal our granite counter tops, I used a liquid that had to wiped on and then buffed. It took so much time that I have never done it since then. Until I ordered this spray. It is very easy to just spray on, wipe and then buff lightly. Now, I can shine the counters on a regular basis, very easily. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Libhart

customer_reviews.title: It is soooo easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The hardest thing of using this was finding a place to put the stuff while I was using the sealer. It was very easy, and the protection was obvious. I also used it on my black sink that contains granite; and, for the first time since the sink was a week old, it looked brand new and the water literally beaded up.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper from home

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sealer and Protector!
customer_reviews.text: Judging by all the good reviews, I decide to give the granite sealer and protector a try. My granite countertop is new, but I can tell the sealer and protector made a difference. After applying the sealer, I can tell there is a protective coating on my granite countertop. Now my paper towel holder is hard to keep in place (lol). It slides all over the countertop very easy. Nice shine and nice sealer... The TriNova Sealer and Protector is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: H. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good product, left the granite counter looking shiny. New construction home with granite counter tops that I don't believe they were sealed when installed. It appeared that items left on the counter was leaving marks in the granite. Cleaned the granite and followed the directions. So far the counter are very smooth feeling with a nice gloss. No more marks left on the granite surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We just put new granite in our bathrooms. The installer said the granite had been sealed, but that we should re-seal it anyway because sometimes they don't do a great job. I sealed the granite using TriNova Granite Sealer and Protectant. It went on nicely and smooth. I am very happy with this product and feel confident my new granite will remain as beautiful in the future as it is today.
customer_reviews.author: Dave In Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Getting my marble top back in shape
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help bring back the luster and remove some water spots on the marble top of a vintage credenza I just bought. Each time I use it the marble gets more shiny and conditioned and the spots are fading slowly but surely.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: be sure to let it cure for about 20minutes between applications.
customer_reviews.text: this was my first stone clean and sealing project. Our surfaces were a bit past due some attention. After a few sections application was mastered down to dipping a toothpick in the sealant and filling a few deeper pitted areas. A little tedious (not for the faint of heart) but the time taken was worth it. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNE McAteer

customer_reviews.title: Like water
customer_reviews.text: This did absolutely nothing for my marble table. Seems like I'm in the minority considering all the positive reviews. I followed the instructions and this had the same effect as spraying plain water on the table. No buffing. No shining. No sealing. Nothing at all to indicate it possibly could have an effect.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't impressed - ended up using something else
customer_reviews.text: We've used other sealers before and weren't impressed with this one. It left lots of water marks all over the counter tops and didn't seem to actually protect anything - we still were noticing dark spots as water could still soak into the granite, even after we applied a second time. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate24

customer_reviews.title: The product is OUTSTANDING!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product was used to seal my granite countertops. I had cleaned my countertops a few days earlier, but ran out of my previous cleaner, I did research on best granite cleaners and Trinova rated in the top 10. I read reviews on Google, Amazon, and You Tube, all ratings were excellent, so I decided to try it. I recieved the product last night and gave it a try this morning. I was very surprised at how enhanced the shine appeared on the counter, since I had cleaned it a few days earlier. This is definitely my new favorite granite countertop sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: This was the best granite sealer I've ever used. It was incredibly easy to apply! I would definitely buy this product again. Most of the sealers i used previously were messy and time consuming. This was not! As easy as it was, I'd use it more often instead of just once a year. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyput

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this product forever. Finally something I will be repurchasing and using to restore the shine to my granite
customer_reviews.author: Dena Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Sealer dries clean and shines well
customer_reviews.text: We paired this with the company's daily cleaner product as well, and used in tandem to seal our counters. Very easy to use, and the sealer dried in perhaps 3-5 minutes to highly reflective sheen. Will definitely keep using it. The bottle is probably good for a few years' worth of sealings, depending on how many surfaces you have.
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Coral Springs, FL

customer_reviews.title: Works great with ease.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and initially works better than the previously used product recommended by the granite installation contractor.
customer_reviews.author: surprise

customer_reviews.title: Using it on Marble and Granite Tops
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to see if this will work, however, it is easy to apply and wipe off with a micro cloth. Hope it works - saw good results on the reviews which impeled me to purchase it. Also bought the cleaner and finished with this one. Hope it works - purchased it because of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok
customer_reviews.text: The sealer was ok.I did expect more from it for the price. I always use a granite cleaner and polish and this worked just the same. I didn’t see any difference with either product except for the price. Kind of disappointed because I was expecting more of a shine then my regular cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use. Scent is nice. And it shined up my granite like brand new after I gave it a good scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: kld311

customer_reviews.title: Easy use but pricey for size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but like the cleaner I think a little pricey for the size plus it doesn’t come with a microfiber cloth. Not sure how well it sealed the granite but easy to use and cures fast as well. Just bigger size please plus a microfiber cloth like what comes with the cleanser. I have small kitchen granite area and don’t think I have enough to do another application.
customer_reviews.author: Shanaynay

customer_reviews.title: Brought the shine back!
customer_reviews.text: We have black granite in our bathrooms (which i would never recommend!). I use granite polish but every time it dried, it looked lifeless and streaky. This brought the shine back. Used it in my kitchen quartz too and it has put a nice sheen back on it. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: First off, there was absolutely no smell!! Product was super easy to use, and I could immediately see the difference. My Granite counter where the product was applied was much smoother than where it was not. I hope it seals it properly, so I dont see any dark spots where it comes in contact with water. Overall, I would definitely recommend this product, and I am a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on purchasing this granite sealer/protector & I'm really glad I did! I used it on my 5 year old granite kitchen countertops & island & it left them super shiny, with a smooth satiny finish. They weren’t dirty or in any way damaged, but this product kind of rejuvenated them. Great product at an excellent price! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna E

customer_reviews.title: This granite sealer is great! It is easy to apply and doesn't take ...
customer_reviews.text: This granite sealer is great! It is easy to apply and doesn't take a lot of effort to buff in. The scent is light and not unpleasant, and dissipated quickly. My counter is smooth and shiny now!
customer_reviews.author: Rachyl

customer_reviews.title: looks great, but lets oil through
customer_reviews.text: looks really great when applied as directed (increases gloss/shine of stone), but it let vegetable oil through to stain the quartz countertop. Only ~6 mo since applied. I would not recommend counting on this to protect natural stone against oils.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: granite sealer shine and protects
customer_reviews.text: reviews are spot on here believe me. Just finished applying to my countertops and can honestly say it has to be seen to be believed. Water beads up on surface and the shine is really noticable. This is going to be my go to from now on and should be yours as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a home with granite countertops, apparently you're supposed to seal the granite periodically. Wow this product really did the job look at that shine!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Boncha

product_meta.title: Granite Sealer & Protector - Best Stone Polish, Protectant & Care Product - Easy Maintenance for Clean Countertop Surface, Marble, Tile - No Streaks, Stains, Haze, or Spots - 18 OZ - TriNova
feature_bullets: ✅ Professional Quality Stone Care – TriNova’s Granite Sealer & Protectant offers a premium sealant and caring solution for your premium stone surfaces, including marble. Whether you’re looking for a sealing product for the first time or a resealer for long-lasting protection, this product can give your granite surfaces the before and after results you want to see. Great for Quartz, Marble, Granite, Quartzite, and Soapstone.

✅ Advanced-Action Stain Protection – This spray uses a powerful blend of polymers to penetrate the stone’s naturally porous surface to block out stains from seeping in and becoming permanent. By doing this, TriNova’s Granite Sealer also provides a protective layer on top of the granite to prevent water spotting and to keep other residue from sticking.

✅ Enhancing Formula for Gloss & Shine – TriNova’s Granite Sealer & Protectant is essential when the time comes to treat all types of stone and to enhance surfaces for a polished and natural look. It also works miracles on grout to guard against stains that develop between your shower or bath tiles that can be the most difficult to remove with your hands and a sponge, no matter how hard you scrub.

✅ Do the Water Test - The best test to see if your granite needs to be sealed is to put drops of water in certain sections of your granite and wait 30 minutes. If the granite absorbs the water, you need to reseal. If not, your granite is protected. However, we still recommend using the Granite Sealer at least once a month to prevent stains from happening in the future.

✅ Trust TriNova - Our products are MADE IN THE USA. We have a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you aren't absolutely satisfied with your TriNova purchase, just tell us and we'll refund the purchase price. That's how much we believe in our products!
